query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS theme_settings (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  accent_color TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT '#B85C38',
  accent_color_hover TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT '#9A4A2E',
  heading_font TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 'DM Serif Display',
  body_font TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 'DM Sans',
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(),
  updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- Enable RLS
ALTER TABLE theme_settings ENABLE ROW LEVEL SECURITY;

-- Public read policy
CREATE POLICY "public_read_theme_settings" ON theme_settings
  FOR SELECT USING (true);

-- Insert default row
INSERT INTO theme_settings (accent_color, accent_color_hover, heading_font, body_font)
VALUES ('#B85C38', '#9A4A2E', 'DM Serif Display', 'DM Sans');
